actionTemplate.title: Build a higher nose root on a flat bridge
steps: Start root shading about 1/3 under the brows; deepen near inner corners
Blend into the eye socket to create natural depth
Add a moon-shaped highlight at the inner corner to increase contrast
Use segmented bridge highlights for more dimension

rationaleTemplate: Contrast at the root creates the illusion of height
Segmented highlight looks more 3D than one flat stripe
